text: @SkyNews At first, use of anti-inflammatories was dangerous. Now it's not. Ventilators could save lives of those in worse condition. Not anymore. Nicotine was increasing risks for everyone. Now it can help. Are scientists of the @WHO and the likes going to agree on anything? #Coronavirus

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
